summary: This is an email exchange between a prosecutor and a defense attorney regarding a letter sent to the defense identifying co-conspirators in the Ghislaine Maxwell case. The email requests a copy of the letter that was previously sent.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The document references a letter sent to the defense in her case identifying co-conspirators.

events.title: Maxwell Discovery Letter
events.description: A letter was sent by the prosecution to the defense identifying co-conspirators in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

keyFacts: The prosecution sent a letter to the defense identifying co-conspirators in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
The letter was sent on or around October 11, 2021.
The email exchange is between a prosecutor and a defense attorney regarding this letter.
The document is part of the discovery process in the Maxwell prosecution.
